title: Vendor Profile
description: Manage your profile, company information and case studies

sections.collectionInfoDescription: Information collected from the application process
sections.caseShowcaseDescription: Showcase your successful cases and project experience

sidebar.tip1: A complete profile and excellent case studies will be shown to brand clients after matching, helping you improve your success rate. Please ensure all information is accurate and complete.

collection.emptyDescription: Click the button below to add company details

toast.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields
toast.fillFieldName: Please fill in field name and value

delete.description: Deleting your account will remove all vendor information and activity history. This action cannot be undone.
